import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductList = () => { const [products, setProduct] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getProducts(); }, []); const getProducts = async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/products'); console.log("product_data",response); setProduct(response.data); } const deleteProduct = async (id) => { await axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/products/${id}`); getProducts(); } return (
Product

) } export default ProductList
